title: WaterNetwork - Junction
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic junction made for the Water Network Management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water network management vertical and related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be Junction

elevation.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Metre'. The elevation above some common reference of the junction. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code

tag.description: Property. An optional text string used to assign the junction to a category, such as a pressure zone

initialQuality.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'mg/L'. Water quality level at the junction at the start of the simulation. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code

description.description: Property. An optional text that describes other significant information about the junction

emitterCoefficient.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'square metre per second'. Discharge coefficient for emitter (sprinkler or nozzle) placed at junction. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code
